code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Security_OAuth2] --> Idle
    Idle --> Connecting: connect(Security_ZeroTrust)
    Connecting --> Connected: connection_ok(Security_Firewall)
    Connecting --> Error: connection_error(Security_OAuth2)
    Connected --> Authenticated: authenticate(Security_Encryption)
    Connected --> Error: auth_timeout(Security_OAuth2)
    Authenticated --> Ready: init_complete(Security_Encryption)
    Authenticated --> Error: init_error(Security_IntrusionDetection)
    Ready --> Idle: disconnect(Security_Firewall)
    Error --> Idle: reset(Security_ZeroTrust)
    Ready --> Transmitting: send_data(Security_Encryption)
    Transmitting --> Ready: transmission_complete(Security_Firewall)
    Transmitting --> Error: transmission_error(Security_ZeroTrust)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
